4.5 Profiling: the Profile structure

profileTool

Function

Structure

Shell.Profile

Type

val profileTool: MLWorks.Profile.profile -> unit

Syntax

profileTool p -> ()

Arguments

p
An execution profile.

Values

()

Description

Invokes the GUI profiler tool on a profile generated by the MLWorks.Profile.profile function.
